content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were sitting on our front porch around midnight.  we live out in the country and did not have any of our outside lights on--we like to look at the stars. after about 5 minutes of sitting there, my wife said, "is that a helicopter or plane?" i looked where she was pointing and saw what appeared to be the lights (red blinking and solid white) of a helicopter or plane just above the tree line. the lights were far enough apart for me to believe it was a helicopter less than a mile away.  but we should have been able to hear it...So at this point i was thinking it was a plane further away. but then things became bizzare; the white solid light began moving away from the blinking red light at a very rapid rate of speed--at least twice as fast.  so at this point i was thinking it couldn't be a plane further away because the other light couldn't possibly move that fast.  so at this point i was thinking it was a closer helicopter again chasing some smaller object with the solid white light.  but if it were closer, why couldn't we hear anything?  we watched as the white light was far enough away to disappear behind the tree line and then a minute later the helicopter disappeared behind the tree line too. we first saw it when it was basically directly in from of us to the north and watched as both lights headed east in a straight line and disappeared within one minute.

i do not know what it was that we saw, but being the rational person i am it must have been the airforce testing some small aircraft and following it with another plane.  they were heading toward fort campbell which is about a 45 minute drive from our house.
content.summary: Small (star like) light being followed by what appeared to be a plane or helicopter.

content.detailedDescription: We were bike riding home from newport beach to huntington beach along seashore. we saw a silvery bright object hovering in the sky sort of over the anaheim area then it made some crazy moves then took off towards palos verdes. we tried to keep our eyes on it but then it was too far away. then we saw two aircraft going in the same direction. not sure what they were but they both gave off a short contrail and were going in the exact same direction as the object.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: White silvery disk hovering over anaheim area then shot off towards palos verdes. shortly fooled by fighter jets

content.detailedDescription: We were throwing football and i looked up and saw a disc shaped object. five minutes later saw two more above the house. it didn't move at all and it seemed like it was higher than a typical jet. we didn't know what to think and we had just seen an advertizement about testing a national alarm on november 9, 2011. it is still in sight but, the other two are gone.
content.summary: Hoverin northeastward ocassional change in place

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from work on sugarloaf parkway between lawrenceville hwy. and five forks trickum at approximately 10:10pm. i saw a craft flying lower than normal (not as low as the tree line, but not as high as a small plane would fly). it seemed to be flying slower than would be possible for a plane, so it caught my attention. then i noticed it had two flashing white lights and then two flashing red lights in sort of a cross or square pattern. i figured it was a small plane because of the flashing lights, but the fact that it was so low to the ground and was moving so slowly kept my attention. i kept my eye on it as much as possible as i drove down the road and it seemed as if it changed directions (like it made a sharp right turn), so i thought it was either a helicopter or a trick of the eye as i was driving.

i lost sight of it, but then when i arrived at my home (less than five minutes later) i saw the object again directly over me (which was odd since it was now flying in the complete opposite direction of when i last saw it). i was out of the car, standing still and it was moving very slowly overhead. we are directly beneath the regular flight path of jets heading toward atlanta airport, so i'm very familiar with jet traffic in the area (which are much higher in the sky, but i can still hear them powering down as they prepare to land at hartsfield, about 40 miles south). at the same time the object was flying over me going north, a regular jet was flying overhead south toward atlanta and i could clearly hear it. in less than a minute the jet was completely gone and i could not hear it anymore, however, the lower object was still slowly flying over me, and that's when i realized that the lower object was not making any noise (so it was clearly not a plane or a helicopter). it made its way over the tree line and was gone.

i stayed out waiting to see if it would come back for another hour, but it didn't. however, a small plane did fly overhead (because i am near a small local airport) and i could clearly hear that it was a plane and it gave me a good reference for what altitude the small planes in the area fly. the object i saw was definitely much lower than that plane. i want to say that it was a box shape, but i'm only basing that on the fact that the two white lights and two red lights were at four corners, but they almost appeared to be on one flat side rather than around an object. the two white lights flashed together and the two red lights flashed together. so, i can't really say what shape it was, maybe flat, maybe square, maybe diamond shaped. it seemed more like it was meandering along quietly rather than hovering. almost like it was making a sweep of the area. i tried to take a video of it with my phone, but i only got it for a second, so you can't really see anything. i don't know what it was, but it was definitely unusual and i would be interested if anyone else has seen anything similar in the area.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Slow, silent, low flying object with red and white flashing lights that changed directions multiple times.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking up from my coffee on the way to high school in the car when i thought a new star appeared. this star was not moving but was brighter than venus, it was about 30 degrees to the south of venus. it stayed where it was for about three minets and suddenly grew 6 triangles ( each the same diameter of the ball).  after a few seconds the triangles collapsed on the ufo and it dissapeared. my reactions were not to be afraid and freak out, i just said " thats number two in my book" and spent a day as normal at school.
content.summary: Wight ball w/ 6 pointed triangles on all sides

content.detailedDescription: I was getting a book to read to my kid at night when i saw an extremely bright orange light in the sky over lake ontario. i called my husband over to see it and asked what he thought it was. i had decided it was a ufo, he thought it was a safety flare from a boat on the water. he went into our kids room, and while he was there a second orb appeared to the left and higher than the first. i called him back in to see. he agreed that it was strange. then the 2nd one disappeared and a third appeared to the right of the original orb. most times. the original one was there, though it would fade away, almost fizzle out. then it would reappear and disappear. the 2nd and 3rd would appear as well, but not as often as the first point. they would just sit and hover there, these bright almost sun like orange orbs.   at one point when the 2nd appeared, it appeared right beside the first, to where we though it was plane headlights, then it moved above the first and then merged with it.  whenthe lights would appear and reappear it was almost like a flame burning and going out. the maximum i stayed the inthe sky without disappearing was 20mins. thus was not a flare. it was not a plane. it barely moved. it was a bit of a distance from us over the water the water. not far from the nuclear powerplant, but not that close either.   my skeptic husband has even decided it's a ufo. they orange orbs looked exactly like the photos of orange ufo that i googled on the computer.   finally around 9:45 the light fizzled out for good and didn't come back n
content.summary: 2-3 lights hovered over lake ontario east of the scarborough bluffs for hours.

content.detailedDescription: i was outside, smoking a cigerarette, it was about 2:00 am in the morning. i noticied the object while i was looking up at the sky  for shooting stars. i knew that i wasn't dreaming, because i saw it before, that first time i saw it i thought my eyes were playing tricks on me but after seeing it again, i know i really saw it the last time. the last time i saw it it was about 2:20 am in the morning. last time i saw it, it was moving kinda slow, it was kinda hazy or smoke filled in a way, it was boomarang shaped or v shaped, it had small red lights inside of it, but the lights were not blinking, and the object did not make a sound. it was low flying, it went right over the tree tops. that was about 6-10monthsw since i've seen it. i never saw it again, until tonight, i was outside smoking just like i said earlier, star gazing, when i saw the object once again, but this time the object was moving faster, it was traveling in the same direction as before, but the red lights were fainter, and it was flying low just as before, that last time i saw it it was aroung 2:30am, this time i saw it @ 2:11 am. i don't know it it is a ufo, a satalight,a military experment or a new expermental plane, or a blimp, or a weather balloon, maybe you or someone else has some answers, i would like to know what this is or may be.I lost sight of it because it disappered. it did the same thing the first time i saw it. everytime i saw it was at nighttime if anyone has any answers as to what this could be i would love to know. my feeling to seeing this object is what could it be? what is it? why have i only seen it 2 times? thanks.
content.summary: Was boomarang shaped with small red lights, that red lights didn't flash.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to have a cigarette. i was standing at the end of the playhouse in the back yard. i was facing the front of the house and i looked up at a commercial airplane (not sure what airline- southwest or continental, unknown) that i saw approaching from the nw direction. at the same time i noticed what at first appeared to be a small airplane off to the right of the other plane, but not parralel to it, i got the impression that it was maybe behind the larger plane but to the side. as i watched the plane i noticed that it didn't have any safety lights, no lights blinking on it at all, but it was as bright as a star only it looked to be a copper color.At that point i thought that what i was seeing was not a plane, but a falling star, however it occurred to me as i watched it that it was not speeding up or burning out, but it was keeping pace with the plane. then it suddenly turned sw and as i kept watching it, it just suddenly vanished, it wasn't there at all. i even quickly moved to the back of the yard to see if i could spot it anywhere, but it never re-appeared in the area i was watching. the night was clear, no clouds blocking, stars were visible, planes clearly visible. i stayed outside for approximately 25 minutes still searching the sky to see if i saw it again or could somehow account for it's disappearance, but could not find it again. in that time period another large commercial plane flew over close to, but not exactly in the same flight path that the first plane i saw flew over. many different aircraft fly over the area in which i reside daily as we are near 2 large and one small airport. i cannot tell you if it made any type of noise, there was other noises from traffic and the plane. i am not certain at what altitude the plane or object was at, or at what speed they were traveling, but i can probaly give you an estimate. i am also not certain what size it was due to not knowing for certain the altitude of the object. i could not make out any distinct features, it just glowed very brightly and moved quickly and smoothly. very odd.
content.summary: Observed what i thought was small aircraft or falling star, following commercial airplane off to right

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were standing in line at a store when somebody came inside to tell everyone about the "three strange objects in the sky outside."  i immediately high-tailed it to the parking lot to witness several very bright orange objects moving slowly from the eastern horizon toward the west. the objects were significantly brighter than stars and appeared orange, unlike any celestial objects i've ever seen.  there were actually 5 objects visible - 3 objects were moving slowly from the east in a triangular formation following the contour of the earth at high altitude, and two more were already overhead and slowly circling each other, as they slowly faded from view as if passing behind a cloud, although the sky was completely clear.  all of the objects slowly faded from view at nearly the same spot, slightly overhead. two more objects appeared from the same direcion and followed in succession only to disappear in the same general location. these were not planes, meteorites, fireworks, or other very easily recognizable aerial objects. i take this subject very seriously, and make this report with the utmost humility and honesty.
content.summary: Seven orange star-like objects moved slowly at apparent high altitude in formation, changing direction , some dramatically, and faded out of sight overhead.

content.detailedDescription: Isaw 20 ufos in my life time never after 2 years ago they be slapping down matrixs my home matrix for 34 years diesd the last 18 days are was into sacramento city where a met mr sloan in job corps i cant see alternate futures 1000 times over i dont have all sieng sight
content.summary: Big purple disce 5 miles wide  1mile tall

content.detailedDescription: i have seen a ball of light about the size of a large beach ball flying over columbus 5 times in the last year.  tonight at about 8:00 pm i was taking out the garbage and noticed it again.  it was low in altitude, i would say less than 1000 feet over head flying from nw to se toward downtown columbus.  it looks like it's about the size of a large beach ball and it has a goldish orangish light that comes from it.  this is no aircraft!  i have flown as a private pilot for many years and know what aircraft look like.  this object moved rapidly from the nw toward downtown, slowed down in speed as it approached down town and stopped completely in mid air. it has been there for over an hour stationary at this point.  it is not the columbus pd helicopter as it was flying west over the grandview area and it was not an aircraft making its turn to final approach  into port columbus.  i am right by the final turn to port columbus and have seen just about every aircraft from commerical to military.  this thing makes no sound and has no anti collision lights.  it literally is a ball with goldish orangish light emitting from it.   there were 2 others who witnessed this with me.   i would love to know if anyone else is seeing this thing over columbus.  have you had anyone else report a similar object in the passed? i would love to know.
content.summary: Moving nw to se and stopping over columbus just west of city

content.detailedDescription: I was stopped at the intersection of rt46 and mahoning ave in austintown ohio this afternoon. i was on rt46 facing mahoning ave in the left turn lane. the sun was shining and it was around 2:45pm. i was staring straight ahead and there was alot of traffic. its mid day rush hour and cars were everywhere. from my left an object came directly into my eyesight. what caught my eye immediately was the sheer length of the object. it seemed to be glowing a bright white and had no appendges. it was very bright there in the sky. not necessarily reflecting the sunshine, more of a glow. it was gliding along very low & slow in the sky. the sheer size of the object was 2-3 or more of full airliners placed in front of each other. it wasnt big in girth, just really long. i see airplanes everyday flying low i know what they look like, this thing was long. theres no way this could have been mistaken for a commercial airliner. i watched it glide over the gas station in the sky. others have had to seen this. it was heading towards ohltown/ norquest blvd direction towards the interstate. i had no method to record it, no camera which was very upsetting. i pulled into the gas station parking lot and watched it go over the treetops. had it not been for the rush hour traffic and having to get my kids from school i would have tried harder to follow it. i had to get back home. there is a nearby bank, gas station and other stores with surveillance cameras. one of them had to have captured this object, it was glowing and big enough to see on cameras for sure. they would be the best in gathering more information. hopefully more people come forward. there has to be others that seen it.
content.summary: Ufo length of 2-3 747 airliners, glowing white daytime sighting

content.detailedDescription: I was in bed watching movie the ring...I have blue shades on my windows.I glanced to my left and through the cracks in my shades i see an orange light..It registered in my mind as a light pole...About 20 or 25 seconds later it registered in my head that i dont have a light pole and i cant see any from the angle i was in my bed..So i jumped up excitedly and whipped my shades back and sure enough there went an orange light across the sky..It looked like it came from the north but i cant say 100 percent for sure..It could have just been the way i was looking at it..So i run out of my room into the hallway to try to get outside to get a better look at it..I had a dumbbell laying in my hallway and stubbed my toe on it..I hopped around for about 3 seconds and ran to my front door...Excitedly i tried to open the door but i had locked it..Time seemed precious...I got the door open and looked out and the orange light had apparently switched directions and was now traveling east..I never saw the change in direction..I was hooping around in my hallway.I watched it for maybe ten or fifteen more seconds before it disappeared over the hillside.Ive seen 5 or 6 strange things in the sky over my life but none of them were the color orange..It was almost the same color as a lit cigarette..I told some of my family about it and they said they had seen something similar a few nights before to the west over a place called beaverdam, but the said they heard noise.I did not..Im really interested in if you know what this object was or if anyone else in my area saw it.Please email me if you know..On a related subject i saw something even more interesting when i was younger..Maybe 7th or 8th grade..I dont remember but iremember what i saw like it was yesterday..I was living with my mom my dad was at lawschool at uk...It was a little 2 room house and no running water so if you had to use the bathroom in the middle of the night you had to go outside..It was around 1 to 3 in the morning..I was leaned up against the side of the house looking at a star doing my biusness..This star was stationary..When all of the sudden it blinked at me..On and off..About a minute later it happened again..A minute later again..Then all of the sudden it starts blinking really fast..I mean really fast..The it appeared to just fall out of the sky while blinking..But that was a long time ago and about six miles away from here but it seems worth mentioning because it has stuck with me all these years..
content.summary: Bright orange light exactly the same color as an orange lightpole or outside nightlight

content.detailedDescription:
Second sighting of a bright object travelling course 080 to 090 over woodstock.   first sighting of an object like this was a few morning ago traveling the same course.  bright and then faded.  silent.  thought it was a satellite.

tonight while walking the dog saw this very bright object, sphere-shaped, brighter than jupiter.  moving the exact same course as before.  whipped out the flip-cam and filmed it as it crossed the sky.

silent.  no navigation lights.  not an airplane and not a satellite.  i've observed satellites before with my eyes alone, through binoculars and through my night vision scope.  way too bright to be a satellite.  not descending.  no characteristic flashing of meteor grazing the atmosphere.  no sonic boom.  

lost sight of the object at the tree-line.
content.summary: tonight saw this very bright object, sphere-shaped, brighter than jupiter.  moving the exact same course as before.  whipped out the flip-cam and filmed it as it crossed the sky.

content.detailedDescription: husband was outside and came to the door for me to come out, asked me if the star above us was moving? i looked up and it seemed to be just hovering and then it started to move very slowly in a south east direction. as we are watching this object basicly float away from us, and there was no sound, the next thing i hear is a helicopter coming in our direction. i told my husband that what ever it is, its being followed by the helicopter. as i was watching the object and the helicopter i couldnt but notice that the helicopter was keeping its distance from the object but following it at a safe distance and speed as the object.
content.summary: Star like object hovering above us then slowly leaves in a south east direction.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello margie kay,
 
i am writing you about the ufo witnessed by john goslin on 10/31/2011.  i saw this with my family on that night. we live in lees summit and we left home at nearly 7:35pm on our way to trick or treat at lees summit north high school. i pulled up to legacy wood and blackwell intersection and was object to south in sky. i turned right onto blackwell and it followed me as i went north. i turned west onto scruggs and saw it clearly until it passed over us near todd george and scruggs. it was large. white lights all over outside diameter of what may be considered a blimp shape. we pondered what it was. had my van windows rolled down and did not hear plane engines. do not believe this was the planes flying to arrowhead. i saw it dip as though it were a blimp as if it pointed nose down but it just didn't look like a blimp. it was too big and moving to fast at that time. it would have been a blimp going sideways to move as it was.
 
after it passed over us and it headed toward the stadium,  we concluded it must be the blimp for the chiefs football game. as we drove up to the lees summit north high school we saw what we think were the planes not sure if they were going to the stadium or preparing to go. this was when we pulled into the parking lot at lees summit north high school at 7:45pm. at that time we were pretty freaked out and not sure what to tell our children it was. 
 
we think we saw two different things in the sky. one being the planes and the other was unidentified. is there a craft on radar for this position and time that i have seen. my wife and children know what we saw was something that was not supposed to be here. not officially. i think the public safety was at risk by what was flying that night. if it was something not licenced or permitted it should be found and those responsible should be charged with suitable crimes. 
 
please contact me and let me tell you more. 
(information moved to fi box) cms 11/06/11 19:00 cdt flg
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw object while driving. i watched it in the sky for 10-15 minutes. it was a large oval shape with white lights on perimiter. black color. it was dark out so not much detail. it was at least 500 ft from me and airborn the whole time.

content.detailedDescription:
There was a object hovering about 2000 to 3000 feet above the ground north of michigan ave (us-12)i watched it for over 20 minutes driving between clinton and saline. also saw it looking west near i-94 and us-23.
it had no wings and no rotors i dont beleve it is a ballon or parachute there was no movment.
ive been a air museum tour guide volanteer at air shows and have worked for major airlines for over 20 years i know my aircrat and i dont know of any that can hover at 2000 feet for 20 minutes.
content.summary: Object hovering about 2000 ft

content.detailedDescription: I live in tulsa oklahoma. i was driving down 61st street in tulsa between sheridan and yale. i looked up and was amazed to see a rainbow cloud that was glowing and beautiful. it was not a rainbow just part of the cloud. i told my son to look up and he saw it also. we were both looking at the cloud and saw a silver illuminated sphere floating upwards beside the cloud! the sphere was lit up then continued to get dull grey then just simply vanished and the rainbow light vanished also! this lasted for a couple of minutes. right after the object disappeared a jet flew by. we saw something really special, my heart is racing and i feel so excited. i was driving so there was no time to snap a picture it all happened so fast.
content.summary: Experience was amazing! rainbow lights illuminated the cloud and a silver sphere beside it disappeared!

content.detailedDescription: Saw a glowing pulsating red orange colored object in the night sky on nov. 3rd 2011 at aprox. 7pm, moving along at about 60 degrees, stopped, hoverd, backed up, changed directions, disapeard and reapeard, hoverd, then disapeard for good.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Unknown
content.summary: Glowing red orange light with triangular shaped round white lights.

content.detailedDescription:
About 30 people were taking part in the ���������haunted woods tour��������� as part of the burlington, wi, vortex conference. we were hiking through the woods at about 9 pm, after dark, with no moon, had just reached ���������the vortex,��������� when someone in the group called out, ���������what���������s up in the sky?���������

we all looked where he was pointing, up beyond some tall pine trees to the east, and saw a flaming orange object flying silently towards us about a mile away and a mile up. the object flew towards us at a slow, steady rate, sometimes zigging and zagging slightly, but always heading right towards us. when it was almost right overhead it disappeared.

then a moment later another one (or the same one) appeared about a mile away to the east and a mile high, and followed the exact same path, also disappearing when it got just about overhead.

the objects didn���������t have any apparent shape, and didn���������t make any noise. they appeared to be made of flickering, flaming orange light.

all 30 people saw it, many took pictures and some took video. my video is posted on youtube as [youtube title moved to field investigator section/cms/tg].
content.summary: Group of 30 people in woods saw two ufos fly overhead and then disappear

content.detailedDescription: Good popcorn movie
content.summary: It was on a dark stormy night

content.detailedDescription: Same object as 33130
content.summary: Same object as seen in case 33130

content.detailedDescription:
While returning to work in ann arbor, mi from a quick trip to manchester, mi. at 9:00 am i was driving east on pleasant lake road approaching fletcher road. i was deciding which route back to ann arbor to take, continue on pleasant lake road or turn north on flecther. when i looked north i observed a flying cylinder about 15' in diameter, 30' tall moving silently and slowly about 1/4 mile up and 2 miles away to the north. i turned north on fletcher to get a closer look. after traveling 1 mile north on fletcher i saw a farmer on the west side of the road. i stopped and pointed out the object to him and asked if he had any idea what it might be. he had not noticed the object before i pointed it out, but he did now see it... i confirmed i was not seeing things from my imagination.I took two pictures with my phone then proceeded north on fletcher to get closer the object was traveling north east at a very slow pace. i pulled into the parking lot of company on this road to get out and take more pictures, it also seemed to be getting closer. several witnesses from the company of the parking lot i was in were also at a loss for what it might be. we observed the object for 10 minutes in this location. i tried to find the object in the frame of the picture i would take with the camera on my phone, i could not find it. i took 4 more pictures of the sky in the area where the object should have been hoping that it would somehow be there even though i could not see in the pictures at that time. the object was now moving south west and getting closer. at one point the object was about 80 degrees from the horizon about a 1/4 mile above the ground, it seemed very solid, still no noise and moving very slow. i should mention that there were no clouds in the sky, temp in the upper 30's lower 40's and almost no wind. finally after 15 minutes total observing the object i left for ann arbor. wanted to stay longer, had to get back to work. when i departed the object was still moving slowly to the south west.
when veiwing the photos find the speck near the center and zoom in. crappy camera, object looked alot closer in real life.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Slow moving cylinder, watched for 15 miniutes with 10 witnesses, left area before it did

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving westward on a narrow two-lane road, and came to a clearing/open field used for crops. i noticed how bright the moon was, and then i noticed a triangular aircraft in my line of vision. i had been driving about 55mph, and i slowed to 35mph so that i could observe. at first, my inclination was that the craft was an airplane. i rolled down my window to observe noise. it was silent. again, the craft was triangular with very very bright lights at each point of the triangle. there was also another light, perhaps on the bottom of the craft (it may have been pinkish, but still the same hue as the other lights). it was hovering in the air at less than the height of a cell phone tower. i came to my turn in the road (a northward turn), and i watched it hover slowly moving northward. i turned around to retrace my path, and to return to the clearing. when i got back there, the craft was gone. i couldn't even see it in the distance.
i was intrigued, but not afraid. i didn't feel anything strange other than maybe adrenaline pumping, because the event was bizarre.
content.summary: Triangular with lights at each point, plus another light.

content.detailedDescription: It was a very clear night nov 4 i walked out onto my porch to smoke a cigaret and i noticed what looked like a very bright white star in the sky to the south east.(not where it should be)by the way i am in wyoming near grand rapids michigan. i noticed it would move but only as short distance left to right. then it would stop an start moving up and down very quickly. almost like someone had it on a string and was jurking up and down on it. least to say no airplane can do these types of movement. i got my crapy camera out and took some pics and video. the video showed what looked like to light on it red and blue i couldn't see this with my eyes only looked like a stay. it would move long distance in the sky and stop. then it would go back in the direction it came from stop. start to jiggle up and down and from side to side very fast at times. while i was watching this i decided to walk out to the road i look up and see a giant triangular boomerang type shaped craft fly over about 500 ft. above me no sound. it had three circular red illuminated lights under it. this ship had to be 300 ft across. i ran in told my fiance who was sleeping then went back out to watch the original ufo i was watching. i would say within 15 min i saw another group of these ships smaller in size flying in a formation like geese same in shape, color, texture and lighting, but smaller.  about a half an hour latter i saw another group fly over. no sound all dull gray with red under light illumination. even after all that 2 hours later this star looking ufo in the sky its still in the same area in the sky doing the same crazy movements i wasn't tired, but knew i had to get up early so i had to go in while it was still in the southern sky
content.summary: I walked out and saw what appered to be a very bright star in a wrong spot. i watched it do some movement not of a star. then i saw 8 ships triangular in shape .

content.detailedDescription:
My dog woke me went to see cause of barking. 4 november 2011///0825 utc--0842 utc  bright light and movement. unsure what it was.  extreme bright white light with erratic jerky, circular movement & hovering approximately 45-75 degrees above horizon in southern sky. object went out of sight by moving away to nothing. news reports this am have no serious wrecks that would require a dustoff (air ambulance). residence is not on any commercial or military vector flight path. uhf amateur radios & scanner/commercial fm&am radio wouldn't function correctly. dish network had distorted signal with black&white display. 

i'm a trained observer; us army retired, lrrp, military mp, security professional, police work-auxiliary, ex-private pilot, and weather spotter.

did not report to local pd's, because county has 2 mobile officers usually 20 miles from my location.
content.summary: Uhf amateur radios&scanner/commercial fm&am radio wouldn't function correctly. dish network had distorted signal with black&white display.  my dog woke me up with barking to the south of house and would not stop.

content.detailedDescription: About 8;30pm i went out on the balcony of my condo and looked east over the lake. their was a very bright light which i though was an aircraft landing lights, but all of a sudden their were six to eight smaller lights popped up one right after another to the right of it. i am a private pilot and i know that atc could not turn that many aircraft at one time. i called my wife to come see the event and when to get my camcorder. this took at lest three to four minutes. the bright object was still in the same place and had not moved. if this was an aircraft on approach to o'hare it would have long been out of my viewing area. my balcony is on the six floor above the tree line. i recorded about two plus minutes which was all the time left on the dvd disc. i did not stay to see how long after that that the light stayed before it left.
content.summary: Have 2 minute dvd of event.

content.detailedDescription:
I first started noticing these starlike objects last year around the same time. fall. this time was amazing. the objects seem to come out of nowhere, travel for some distance and then slowly turn from bright white to red and the fade away. they don't zoom off, they simply fade out like someone turned of a dimmer switch. i saw 5 of these objects last night at different times going in different directions. this part is what really amazed me about the last one i saw. i had my camcorder out and got one on film.  most of them are too far away to get a good steady shot. the last one appeared traveling from my left to right. as soon as i turned my camcorder on it faded out. i then turned off my camcorder and said "suckers". as soon as the word left my mouth a bright flash appeared at the same spot and it was gone. i was amazed. i'm no scientist but i'm starting to wonder if this part of the world at this time of the year is possibly a portal for the ufo's. i can see them almost every night. i have pointed them out to my neighbors, friends and family and they have all seen them. i just wish i can record one from the beginning to the end of the event.  we live in an area where airplanes are a norm. these are not airplanes. no flashing lights. just one bright steady light. 
i live in the parkville maryland area. usa.
content.summary: Bright starlike objects seem to come out of nowhere.

content.detailedDescription: Between 6 and 8 of us kids were playing hot box with a baseball. i went to get a drink and finished it on the back porch while i noticed and watched this white light approaching. as it got closer it was obvious it was too low for a plane and took too long to get to us. it took several minutes to go a couple of miles. i called all the kids up to the back porch to watch it with me. we all saw it come to within 500 feet or so and then stop. hovering over a neighbors house with just a 2 lane road between our houses. it had lights on the bottom edge blinking on and off and going in a counter-clockwise direction. lights were not going fast, just a casual pace. the color was a dull gray brushed aluminum. it was shaped like 2 plates put together and the lights were at the middle section going around the disk. it made no noise. i remember not being scared but the 2 neighbor girls started crying when i said it was a ufo. the girls said "don't say that we will have nightmares" and i said, "look at that thing and tell me it isn't a ufo". i went and got my mother who was on the phone. she said to the person on the phone,"hold on the kids are saying they see something outside. she set the phone down and came outside. she was a little upset that we bothered her but when she came outside she said "holy !@#$". someone get the camera. i went and got the camera and gave it to her and she aimed it at the craft took a picture and the film didn't advance. it was an old flash cube camera. the flash went off but when she opened it there was no film. . my mother said "i just put film in this yesterday". she ran back in and told the person on the phone she had to go. we continued to watch it for a few minutes until it left horizontally but raising a small amount as it left. i called a friend down the street and he dropped the phone and said, "holy!@#$" and i heard the phone dangling and hitting the wall. he came back and said "i will call you back i have to see this". at this point i was back outside and the disk had moved to the southwest about a mile. approximately 1,500 feet above the ground and appeared to be above the holley rod and gun club. it was much higher now but still very clear to the naked eye. within a few seconds another disk hovered over to the first one only a few hundred feet apart. they hovered there for about 20 seconds or so. the first one went zip into the sky leaving just a trail of light behind it and the the second one followed the same path. i looked towards the friends house that i had called as the objects i was watching couldn't be the same one as they were too low for him to see them and he had said i see them. when he said that; i could only see one. sure enough 5-7 more of them hovered real slow along what appeared to be the erie canal. it is only a little over a quarter of a mile away from our house and in between my friends house who was on the phone and mine. the person my mother was on the phone with also said she saw them and that one had landed in her apple orchard. i still know where they lived and often wonder... if they landed is there a place to get a reading from? my father came home later and we told him. he laughed and didn't believe. he did a few years later as we kept telling him the same story year after year. nothing changed.
content.summary: Flew west towards house at slow speed. no sound hovered over neighbors house for 5 mins. left to join another ufo
